# Bracken

Bracken will extract the species abundances from kraken2 output. 

Select "Bracken" from tools: 

1.  Kraken report file: Kraken2 on collection: Report
2.  Select a Kmer distribution: PlusPF (2021-05-17)
3.  Level: Species
4.  Produce Kraken-Style Bracken report: Yes

![Bracken setup options](/images/bracken_setup_options.png)

## Braken report

Bracken will generate a report with the abundances of some of the species in the sample:
